start: ^Hey there! Nice to see you! Can I please get a
^Of course! I'm glad you stopped by again.
^You've got it. Is whole milk fine?

c-0: ^Girl, you know it! The drink I got last time was magnifique.
g-0: ^How have things been going with the cafe?
^Business has been slow, but it's getting better!
^Better than I expected! I'm glad people can enjoy the coffee I make

c-2: ^Don't worry, once word gets around about this place you'll have a line out the door.
c-3: ^I can tell! Every coffee shop in the city is a chain, we needed a cafe with pizzazz.

g-1: ^I wish I had my own storefront...
^It's hard to open a shop, the rent is sooo expensive.

c-4: ^I'm a fashion designer... however right now I'm just selling clothes at a lame shop.
c-5: ^Ugh, I know. If I was rich I would be unstoppable.

g-2: ^I've just been selling my fashions online as a side hustle until I save up enough to rent out a shop.

c-6: ^It is convenient, but I only make like one sale a month.
c-7: ^You really think so?? I've been working on a name for my business but one hasn't stuck yet.

g-3: ^You really slay with the latte art, I bet this one will be adorbs too

c-8: ^You're too kind-- I've been practicing a lot!
